sentences.en: A digestibility value of 70 - 80 percent seems a reasonable expectation.
sentences.cn: 70%-80% 的消化率似乎是合理的期望值.

sentences.en: Contrary to general expectation, he announced that all four had given their approval.
sentences.cn: 与大众的期盼相反的是，他宣布那4个人都同意了。

sentences.en: Do we have to lower our expectation and our standard of living?
sentences.cn: 我们是否要降低期望,降低生活水平?

sentences.en: Having raised expectations (= made people more hopeful ), he went on to help only a few people.
sentences.cn: 他唤起了大家的希望，但接着只是帮助了几个人。

sentences.en: He came short of our expectation.
sentences.cn: 他使我们失望.

sentences.en: It is always liable to be affected by expectation of the future.
sentences.cn: 它常容易受到对将来的预期的影响.

sentences.en: It's our expectation that you will do well.
sentences.cn: 我们期望你干得出色.

sentences.en: Some people have totally unrealistic expectations of both medical and nursing staff.
sentences.cn: 有些人对医护人员的期望完全不切实际。

sentences.en: The beauties of the West Lake in spring were beyond his expectation.
sentences.cn: 西湖的春景要比他所预想的更加美丽.

sentences.en: The beauty of the scenery surpassed my expectation.
sentences.cn: 该处风景之秀丽超出我的预料.

sentences.en: The mood is one of paranoia and expectation of war.
sentences.cn: 那是一种对战争既畏惧又期待的心理。

sentences.en: The number of people who attended fell short of expectations (= was lower than expected ).
sentences.cn: 出席的人数比预期的要少。

sentences.en: The plaintiff is aged 30 and has a normal expectation of life.
sentences.cn: 原告30岁,预期有正常的寿命.

sentences.en: The result is contrary to expectation.
sentences.cn: 结果跟预料恰好相反.

sentences.en: The show exceeded all expectations (= was much better than expected ).
sentences.cn: 这场演出比人们预期的要好得多。

sentences.en: The weight of expectation was getting to them.
sentences.cn: 他们逐渐感觉到了期望带来的压力。

sentences.en: They have adopted the measure contributing to realize the expectation aim.
sentences.cn: 他们采取了有助于实现预期目标的措施.

sentences.en: We are in momentary expectation of the arrival of you.
sentences.cn: 我们无时无刻不在盼望你的到来.

sentences.en: When he set out for Bath again, there was a general expectation.
sentences.cn: 当他又出发到巴斯去的时候, 有这样一种一般的揣测.

sentences.en: Women who have high expectations of marriage are often disappointed.
sentences.cn: 对婚姻怀有很高期望的女性常常会感到失望。

words.tran_cn: 期待的；怀孕的；预期中的

phrases.tran_cn: 平均寿命；预期寿命（等于life expectancy）
按照期望做到，不负众望

trans.tran_en: what you think or hope will happen
